text: Carlo Alberto de Gavardo Prohens (14 July 1969 â€“ 4 July 2015) was a Chilean motorist and motorcyclist. He has participated in numerous rallies worldwide, including the Dakar Rally and Rallye des Pharaons. He was the first Chilean motorcyclist to run the Paris-Dakar from beginning to end. de Gavardo died of respiratory arrest in Buin, Chile, aged 45.Carlo de Gavardo fallece tras sufrir paro respiratorio ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chilean sportspeople
title: Carlo de Gavardo
